AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: DICTIONARY_ID_WEBSITE
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Website where the system sequences are found (MSequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: DICTIONARY_ID_USER
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: User (sourceforge developer) to get the system sequences (MSequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: DICTIONARY_ID_PASSWORD
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Password to get the system sequences (MSequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: DICTIONARY_ID_COMMENTS
AD_SYSCONFIG.VALUE: I forgot to set the DICTIONARY_ID_COMMENTS System Configurator
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Comment to reserve the system sequences (MSequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PROJECT_ID_WEBSITE
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Website where the system sequences are found (MSequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PROJECT_ID_PROJECT
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Name of the project you are working on for development

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PROJECT_ID_USER
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: User (sourceforge developer) to get the system sequences (MSequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PROJECT_ID_PASSWORD
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Password to get the system sequences (MSequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PROJECT_ID_COMMENTS
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Comment to reserve the system sequences (MSequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: DICTIONARY_ID_USE_CENTRALIZED_ID
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Flag to indicate if we use centralized ID approach or not

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PROJECT_ID_USE_CENTRALIZED_ID
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Flag to indicate if we use centralized ID approach or not

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PAYMENT_OVERWRITE_DOCUMENTNO_WITH_CHECK_ON_PAYMENT
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Y/N - Define if the payment document number must be overwritten with the check number

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PAYMENT_OVERWRITE_DOCUMENTNO_WITH_CREDIT_CARD
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Y/N - Define if the payment document number must be overwritten with the credit card

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: PAYMENT_OVERWRITE_DOCUMENTNO_WITH_CHECK_ON_RECEIPT
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Y/N - Define if the payment (receipt) document number must be overwritten with the check number

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ALERT_SEND_ATTACHMENT_AS_XLS
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Send alert results as Excel attachments

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: SYSTEM_INSERT_CHANGELOG
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Keep change log for inserts: Y - Yes, N - No, K - just the key _ID

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: SYSTEM_NATIVE_SEQUENCE
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Y - Yes Use Native Sequence , N - No Use Adempiere Sequence (AD_Sequence)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: START_VALUE_BPLOCATION_NAME
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Define the start value for C_BPartner_Location.Name (possible values 0 to 4) - complete definition here http://adempiere.com/wiki/index.php/ManPageW_SystemConfigurator

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ZK_PAGING_SIZE
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Default paging size for grid view in zk webui

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ZK_GRID_EDIT_MODELESS
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Grid view will enter in edit mode

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ZK_DASHBOARD_REFRESH_INTERVAL
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Milliseconds of wait to run the dashboard refresh on zk webui client

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ZK_DESKTOP_CLASS
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: package+classname of zk desktop class

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ProductUOMConversionUOMValidate
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Enable/disable validation -> Select the Product UoM as the From Unit of Measure

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ProductUOMConversionRateValidate
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Enable/disable validation -> The Product UoM needs to be the smallest UoM - Multiplier must be > 0

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: MENU_INFOUPDATER_SLEEP_MS
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Milliseconds of wait to run the infoupdater class on the menu window

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: WEBUI_LOGOURL
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: url for the logo in zkwebui

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: CASH_AS_PAYMENT
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Record Cash as a Payment (True) or Cash Journal (False)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: CHECK_CREDIT_ON_CASH_POS_ORDER
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Check credit on Cash POS Order

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: CHECK_CREDIT_ON_PREPAY_ORDER
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Check credit on Prepay Order

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: 2PACK_HANDLE_TRANSLATIONS
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Define if 2pack handle translations or not

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: INFO_DEFAULTSELECTED
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Info windows - Specify if the records should be checked(selected) by default (multi selection mode only)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: INFO_DOUBLECLICKTOGGLESSELECTION
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Info Window - True if double click on a row toggles if row is selected (multi selection mode only)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: CLIENT_ACCOUNTING
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Enable client Accounting -> D - Disabled (default) / Q - Queue (enabled to post by hand - queue documents for posterior processing) / I - Immediate (immediate post)

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: LOCATION_MAX_CITY_ROWS
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Number of rows to show on city autocomplete feature on Location window

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ZK_LOGIN_ALLOW_REMEMBER_ME
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Allow remember me on zkwebui - allowed values [U]ser / [P]assword / [N]one

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: SWING_LOGIN_ALLOW_REMEMBER_ME
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Allow remember me on swing - allowed values [U]ser / [P]assword / [N]one

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: REAL_TIME_POS
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Enable Overwrite of Date on POS generated Invoice. When a POS Order is not completed immediately then on Completion ADempiere generated Invoice (Customer) with Date from the POS Order. In some cases this is not desired.

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ALogin_ShowOneRole
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Show Role List Box when there is just one role to select

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: QTY_TO_SHOW_FOR_SERVICES
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Quantity to show for services in InfoProduct window

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: MAIL_SEND_BCC_TO_FROM
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: When enabled the outgoing mails from Adempiere will be sent BCC to the originating user

AD_SYSCONFIG.NAME: ZK_ROOT_FOLDER_BROWSER
AD_SYSCONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Root Folder to be used when opening server files.
